response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its significance and rarity, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to its true worth. I trust that you will appreciate the exceptional quality and the unparalleled benefits this product offers. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of sharing this remarkable experience with you.", "product_price": 950000}
